name: Purgatorius Survivor
description:
A prototype made during Kiss Your Teacher Game Jam (48h)

A work in progress, with lots of idea to explain to young children Darwin's Theory of Evolution through a Purgatorius ( a little mammal, ancestor of lemur, apes and primate)

Game introduction available.

Programming (C#) : Richard & Esther

Graphism: Quentin

Sound : Martin & Pablo (2 sound designers where available during the event for all project without sound designer)
